name: fso-part3
description: This is the backend for fullstackOpen part 3

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fsO-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Kellen Bolger
